	External calls:

index in CoinFlip.getPlayerFlips (/unique_chucks/17/0x1a9206cd9a4c59967ca728ca96b15287b2fd4c7c.sol#1466-1467) is a local variable never initialiazed
query in CoinFlip._initializeFlip (/unique_chucks/17/0x1a9206cd9a4c59967ca728ca96b15287b2fd4c7c.sol#1280) is a local variable never initialiazed

CoinFlip.withdrawToken (/unique_chucks/17/0x1a9206cd9a4c59967ca728ca96b15287b2fd4c7c.sol#1426-1427) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,_amount) (/unique_chucks/17/0x1a9206cd9a4c59967ca728ca96b15287b2fd4c7c.sol#1427)

CoinFlip.withdrawTokens (/unique_chucks/17/0x1a9206cd9a4c59967ca728ca96b15287b2fd4c7c.sol#1428-1436) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-IERC20(_token).transfer(owner,_amount) (/unique_chucks/17/0x1a9206cd9a4c59967ca728ca96b15287b2fd4c7c.sol#1432-1434)
